name: CodePipelinePipelineStages
description: Stages is a property of the AWS::CodePipeline::Pipeline resource that specifies a sequence of tasks for AWS CodePipeline to complete on an artifact.

properties.name: Actions
properties.description: The actions to include in this stage.
properties.typeDescription: List of AWS CodePipeline Pipeline Stages Actions

properties.name: Blockers
properties.description: The gates included in a stage.
properties.typeDescription: List of AWS CodePipeline Pipeline Stages Blockers
